body: That changes behavior very significantly so I'm not sure it's a good idea overall.
It shouldn't hurt if we do this only for `$expire` smaller than 30 days.
I like @rob006 solution. We can reliably detect the intent in this case. If value is less than 2592001 then it's duration. Otherwise it's timestamp.

issue.title: Fix MemCache duration normalization to avoid memcached/system timestamp mismatch
